mapper.select: SELECT p.purchase_no, buy_date, art_title, date_time, purchase_count, p.art_no, CASE WHEN r.STATUS='Y' THEN '환불대기중' WHEN r.STATUS='N' THEN '환불 완료' ELSE '예매완료' END AS REFUNDS, wayBill_number FROM PURCHASE p JOIN ART a on(p.ART_NO=a.ART_NO) JOIN ART_TIME td on(td.ART_NO=a.art_no) JOIN REFUND r on(p.PURCHASE_NO=r.purchase_no) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id} AND BUY_DATE <= add_months(sysdate,-3) ORDER BY DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM PURCHASE p JOIN ART a on(p.ART_NO=a.ART_NO) JOIN ART_TIME td on(td.ART_NO=P.art_no) JOIN IMG I ON(I.ART_NO=P.ART_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id} AND TO_CHAR(DATE_TIME,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM PERSONAL PER JOIN ART A ON(PER.ART_NO=A.ART_NO) JOIN TICKET_DATE T ON(per.art_no=t.art_no ) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE PER_TYPE=1 AND M_ID=#{ID} AND ROWNUM <=3 ORDER BY PER_ENROLLDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE p JOIN ART a on(p.ART_NO=a.ART_NO) JOIN ART_TIME td on(td.ART_NO=p.art_no) JOIN REFUND r on(p.PURCHASE_NO=r.purchase_no) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id}

SELECT p.purchase_no, buy_date, art_title, date_time, purchase_count, p.art_no, CASE WHEN r.STATUS='Y' THEN '환불대기중' WHEN r.STATUS='Y' THEN '환불 완료' ELSE '예매완료' END AS REFUNDS, wayBill_number,origin_name,change_name FROM PURCHASE p JOIN ART a on(p.ART_NO=a.ART_NO) JOIN ART_TIME td on(td.ART_NO=a.art_no) JOIN REFUND r on(p.PURCHASE_NO=r.purchase_no) JOIN IMG i on(p.art_no=i.art_no) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id} ORDER BY DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT p.purchase_no, buy_date, art_title, date_time, purchase_count, p.art_no, wayBill_number, p.seat_name, type, at.time_no, art_type, change_name, CASE WHEN r.STATUS='Y' THEN '환불대기중' WHEN r.STATUS='Y' THEN '환불 완료' ELSE '예매완료' END AS REFUNDSFROM PURCHASE p JOIN IMG I ON(P.ART_NO= I.ART_NO) JOIN ART a on(p.ART_NO=a.ART_NO) JOIN ART_TIME at on(at.ART_NO=a.art_no) JOIN REFUND r on(p.PURCHASE_NO=r.purchase_no) JOIN SEAT s on(s.time_no=at.time_no) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id} ORDER BY DATE_TIME DESC
SELECT * FROM PERSONAL P JOIN ART A ON(P.ART_NO= A.ART_NO) JOIN IMG I ON(P.ART_NO= I.ART_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE PER_TYPE=1 AND M_ID= #{ID}

SELECT * FROM PERSONAL P JOIN ART A ON(P.ART_NO= A.ART_NO) JOIN TICKET_DATE TD ON(P.ART_NO= TD.ART_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE PER_TYPE=2 AND M_ID= #{ID} AND TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM (select BUY_DATE FROM PURCHASE JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_ID=#{id} order by 1 DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT COMMENT_NO, CONTENT,ART_NO,CNO, STAR FROM REPLY C JOIN MEMBER M on(C.RWRITER=M.M_ID) where M.M_ID= #{id} AND C.STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PERSONAL VALUES(PER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{ID}, (SELECT TICKETING_DATE FROM TICKET_DATE WHERE ART_NO=#{pNO})-1/24, 2,SYSDATE,#{pNO} )
INSERT INTO PERSONAL VALUES(PER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,(SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID=#{ID}),NULL,1,SYSDATE,#{artNO} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ART JOIN TICKET_DATE USING(ART_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(TICKETING_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT * FROM ART A JOIN TICKET_DATE TD ON(A.ART_NO=TD.ART_NO) JOIN IMG I ON(A.ART_NO=I.ART_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(TICKETING_DATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY TICKETING_DATE ASC
SELECT * FROM ART A JOIN ART_TIME AT ON(A.ART_NO=AD.ART_NO) JOIN IMG I ON(A.ART_NO=I.ART_NO) WHERE ART_NO=#{artNo}
